meanings: (동서남북) the four directions[sides], (둘레의 모든 방향) all directions[quarters], everywhere

vlive.korean: [사방이 적] 얘가 하이인데... [He's surrounded by enemies] He has a high tone but... 듣기 View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 20. 경희대 래빈VS 서울대 츄플 리매치!? 과연 살아남을 학교는 어디?
vlive.english: [He's surrounded by enemies] He has a high tone but...

vlive.korean: [빗물에 쓸려 온 퍼즐이 사방에] 이렇게 많은데? 이걸 안 보고 갔다고? [Puzzles came down on rain water everywhere] So many! He passed through these? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2019 - EP.87
vlive.english: [Puzzles came down on rain water everywhere] So many! He passed through these?

vlive.korean: 사방이 다 돼지인 거야. and there were golden pigs all over the place. 듣기 View video THE BOYZ : 학주켑😀
vlive.english: and there were golden pigs all over the place.

vlive.korean: 바다가 이렇게 연결돼 있어 - 사방이... You can see the sea everywhere. - In four directions. 듣기 View video NCT : 일단 들어와 봅세 ~~~ 💚
vlive.english: You can see the sea everywhere. - In four directions.

vlive.korean: 이 친구는 퀸이라서 사방이랑 다 갈 수 있어요 - 퀸이야? This one is Queen and she can go anywhere. - Queen? 듣기 View video PENTAGON : 릴레이 V LIVE : Hip Hop Unit
vlive.english: This one is Queen and she can go anywhere. - Queen?

examples.korean: The fields around had been sown with wheat. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 사방의 들판에는 밀이 심어져 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The fields around had been sown with wheat. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They looked around for any signs of habitation. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 무슨 주거의 흔적이 있나 하고 사방을 둘러보았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They looked around for any signs of habitation. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The mug tipped over, spilling hot coffee everywhere. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 머그잔이 넘어지면서 뜨거운 커피가 사방에 쏟아졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The mug tipped over, spilling hot coffee everywhere. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Climbing plants rambled over the front of the house. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 반연 식물들이 그 집 앞면 위로 사방으로 뻗어나 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Climbing plants rambled over the front of the house. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The cushion split open and sent feathers everywhere. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 쿠션이 찢어져 속이 터지면서 깃털이 사방으로 날아갔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The cushion split open and sent feathers everywhere. Add to Wordbook
